name: Easter Bonus
summary: Easter Bonus is a match-three game with an Easter theme. To clear the levels, you must turn all the squares gold. You do this by making matches of three or more items over them or using bonus items. Later in the game, some squares are coated in ice. Items in ice cannot be moved and iced squares cannot be turned gold until the ice is removed. To break the ice, you match the item trapped in the ice or use a bonus item. You must do this before the candle on the left burns down, meaning your time is up. As mentioned earlier, there are bonus items
